Articles.Content: I play ksp and I see people increasing their throttle to help with liftoff, to land, and to control the rocket. It seems very useful but I have no idea on how to do it on the ps4. I search up how to do it but it only shows how to do it on the pc. Does anyone know how to on or is it possible on the ps4? (Kerbal space program enhanced edition)
Yes, hold L1 and use the up and down buttons on the d-pad to control the throttle to your preference. Took me a little bit to figure that one out too. Happy launchings!

To move the throttle from any position to "Off or 0%" press down on the D-pad.

To move the throttle from any position to "Full or 100%" press up on the D-pad.

To make small throttle adjustments Hold L1 and move the the Throttle with the D-pad.
